## R Markdown

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
require(gridExtra)
library(tidymodels)
library(dplyr)
```


```{r}
data <- read.csv(file = "shot_logs.csv")
unique <- unique(data$player_name)
filter(data, player_name == "brian roberts")
plot1 <- ggplot(data,mapping = aes(x=SHOT_DIST,y=CLOSE_DEF_DIST,color = SHOT_RESULT)) + geom_point()
plot2 <- ggplot(data,mapping = aes(x=SHOT_DIST,y=CLOSE_DEF_DIST,color = PTS_TYPE)) + geom_point()
grid.arrange(plot1, plot2, ncol=2)
```

```{r}
resample <- initial_split(prop = .7, data)
test <- testing(resample)
train <- training(resample)
```

```{r}
ggplot(train) + geom_point(aes(x = SHOT_DIST, y = CLOSE_DEF_DIST, color = PTS_TYPE))
ggplot(train) + geom_point(aes(x = SHOT_DIST, y = CLOSE_DEF_DIST, color = SHOT_RESULT))
```
```{r}
train %>% mutate(SHOT_RESULT = ifelse(SHOT_RESULT == "made", 1, 0))
```

```{r}
lmfit <- lm(SHOT_RESULT ~ CLOSE_DEF_DIST, train)
```
```{r}
lmfit
```
